scripts.old-test: NODE_ENV=test node ../forms-angular/website/server.js & npx webdriver-manager update --versions.chrome=$(google-chrome --version | cut -d ' ' -f 3) && npx webdriver-manager start --versions.chrome=$(google-chrome --version | cut -d ' ' -f 3) & npx protractor test/e2e/protractor/protractor-chrome.conf.js
scripts.clear: kill `ps -ef | grep '[0-9] node ../forms-angular/website/server.js' | egrep -o ' ([0-9]+) ' | head -1 | sed -e 's/ //'` -9
